summary: VEHICLE LEAKING FUEL FROM FUEL TANK PIPE GROMMET.  TOOK THE CAR TO OTHER REPAIR FACILITY OTHER THAN DEALER, THIS REPAIR FACILITY INFORMED ME OF THE RECALL 00V350000.  I THEN TOOK THE CAR TO THE FORD DEALERSHIP WHERE I HAD BOUGHT THE VEHICLE NEW.  THEY INFORMED ME THAT THIS RECALL WAS NOT ISSUED FOR MY CAR.  IS THERE ANY WAY TO CHECK FOR MYSELF IF THIS RECALL IS INDEED ON MY CAR?  VIN # [XXX] FORD CONTOUR SE SPORT.  I FEEL THE DEALER MAY BE MISHANDLING THE REPAIR.   *NLM    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
